description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
study location where the research was conducted - Leipzig / Kumamoto
condition presented to the participant -  fb1 (false believe task 1) / fb2 (false believe task 2).
time in milliseconds the participant looked at the target
time in milliseconds the participant looked at the distractor
differential looking score between target and distractor
whether the participant looked at the target first - 1 = yes / 0 = no
whether the participant looked at the distractor first - 1 = yes / 0 = no
whether the participant looked at the target first - 1 = yes / 0 = no
